options.infoText:
Options:
'0' = Not Present,
'1' =  KeyBoard,
'2' =  RaspberryPi,
'3' =  EbbSimulator,
'4' = EbbConnector

The path from where the object will be imported
eg. 'application/devices/gpioctrl'
The base directory from where to serve files

'13' = AppLxCash,

The default running mode of the application
The maximum log files retention in days in [1,365].
Duration (in ms) of a temporary display screen.
Time (in ms) required to trigger fraud alarm after a door open event.
Time (in ms) required to trigger a back to idle action.
The minimum decimal precision to be guaranted for amounts.
